StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPhoneHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @LeadID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [OldValue], [NewValue], [ChangeDate] FROM [dbo].[LeadHistory], [dbo].[LeadHistoryLineItem] WHERE LeadID = @LeadID AND [LeadHistory].[LeadHistoryID] = [LeadHistoryLineItem].[LeadHistoryID] AND [LeadHistoryLineItem].[ChangedField] = 'PrimaryPhone' ORDER BY [ChangeDate] desc
